movies.title: The Wailing
movies.plot: Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.

movies.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once

poster.alt: Jamie Lee Curtis, Michelle Yeoh, James Hong, Ke Huy Quan, and Stephanie Hsu in Everything Everywhere All at Once (2022)

movies.plot: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure, in which she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.

movies.title: Nope

poster.alt: Jordan Peele, Keke Palmer, Daniel Kaluuya, and Steven Yeun in Nope (2022)

movies.plot: The residents of a lonely gulch in inland California bear witness to an uncanny and chilling discovery.

movies.title: Three Thousand Years of Longing

poster.alt: Idris Elba and Tilda Swinton in Three Thousand Years of Longing (2022)

movies.plot: A lonely scholar, on a trip to Istanbul, discovers a Djinn who offers her three wishes in exchange for his freedom.

movies.title: Parasite

poster.alt: Song Kang-ho, Jung Ik-han, Jung Hyun-jun, Joo-hyung Lee, Lee Ji-hye, Lee Sun-kyun, Cho Yeo-jeong, Park Myeong-hoon, Park Keun-rok, Jang Hye-jin, Choi Woo-sik, Park Seo-joon, Park So-dam, Lee Jeong-eun, and Jung Ji-so in Parasite (2019)

movies.plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: The Handmaiden

poster.alt: Kim Min-hee, Ha Jung-woo, Cho Jin-woong, and Kim Tae-ri in The Handmaiden (2016)

movies.plot: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

movies.title: The Shape of Water

poster.alt: Doug Jones and Sally Hawkins in The Shape of Water (2017)

movies.plot: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature that is being held in captivity.

movies.title: Blade Runner 2049

poster.alt: Harrison Ford, Jared Leto, Ryan Gosling, and Ana de Armas in Blade Runner 2049 (2017)

movies.plot: Young Blade Runner K's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former Blade Runner Rick Deckard, who's been missing for thirty years.

movies.title: Dune

poster.alt: Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Rebecca Ferguson, Jason Momoa, Sharon Duncan-Brewster, Oscar Isaac, Timothée Chalamet, and Zendaya in Dune (2021)

movies.plot: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset while its heir becomes troubled by visions of a dark future.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.plot: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: Anastasia

poster.alt: John Cusack, Meg Ryan, Christopher Lloyd, Liz Callaway, Jim Cummings, and Jonathan Dokuchitz in Anastasia (1997)

movies.plot: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

movies.title: I Saw The Devil

poster.alt: Choi Min-sik and Lee Byung-hun in I Saw the Devil (2010)

movies.plot: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.
